subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Roman Kreuziger took control of the Tour de Suisse cycling race by winning an individual time trial in the mountains. A rider for Liquigas, he has a 48-second overall lead with one stage left.
snippet: Roman Kreuziger took control of the Tour de Suisse cycling race by winning an individual time trial in the mountains. A rider for Liquigas, he has a 48-second overall lead with one stage left.
